Kalphite Soldiers can be found in the Kalphite Hive west of Shantay Pass. They are the second weakest of all attackable kalphites.

  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Drops

  • 8 References

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Kalphite Hive65None7Maplink
Kalphite Hive65None6Maplink

Strategy[edit | edit source]

Kalphite Soldiers are most easily reached by a boss portal attuned to the Kalphite Queen, which sends players outside her chamber, and running west.

Kalphite soldiers attack only with melee, which has a slightly uncommon chance to cause poison on a successful hit. The poison is fairly weak, however, and wears off after a few hits. They are weak to Water spells.

They are a decent option for mid-level kalphite Slayer assignment, as they are fairly weak and aggressive to players level 130 or below. Low level players can safe spot them behind the buried skeleton.

Rare drop table[edit | edit source]

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Ludikeris ( 15) – Kill a scarab mage, locust rider or kalphite with the Keris dagger.

Graphical updates[edit | edit source]

  • Kalphite Soldier after 2004

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • ninja 25 April 2016 (Update):
    • Improved respawn rates for Kalphites.
  • patch 7 October 2009 (Update):
    • Improved the clickable area of kalphite soldiers.
  • update 7 September 2004 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Despite appearing to take up 3x3 squares, kalphite soldiers actually only cover a 2x3 area.
